body.name: WONGS BEDDING Botanical Comforter Set Queen, 7 Pieces Grey Palm Tree Bed in a Bag, Reversiable Soft Microfiber Bedding Set with Comforter, Flat Sheet, Fitted Sheet, Pillow Shams & Pillowcases
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 48 mins
features: 【7 PIECES QUEEN BED IN A BAG】: Grey botanical leaves floral comforter reversiable bed in a bag queen with 1 Comforter 90" x 90" + 2 Pillowcases 20" x 26"+ 1 Fitted Sheet 60"x 80"+12"+ 1 Flat Sheet 90"x 102"+ 2 Pillow Shams 20"x 30".

【 SPECIAL THREE-COLOR BOTANICAL PATTERN 】: Three-color botanical and floral collision design, modern and fashionable, can be matched with any style of room, bring noble and elegant visual experience, is the best gift for friends and relatives !

【SOFT MICROFIBER BEDDING SET】: Grey botanical comforter queen size made of high quality and lightweight microfiber, fluffy and soft to the touch, light and breathable, bringing you the ultimate tactile enjoyment of your skin and providing you with a healthier quality of sleep all year round.

【EXQUISITE WORKMANSHIP】: Queen bed in a bag comforter size set is simple elegant bedding, Several invisible stitching prevent the filling from shifting or leaking out，the firm stitching ensures it will last for years to come.
【EASY CARE】: High-quality fabric is not easy to tear, machine wash in the gentle cycle with cold water, do not bleach, keep the original color after washing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight But Warm
reviews.reviewText: When I unpackaged the comforter, I was a little hesitant because it was so lightweight. But I was surprised to find that it's actually very warm and more comfortable than my old heavy comforter. It was wrinkled from being packaged, but I put it in the dryer on low and the wrinkles came out easily. The pattern and colors are beautiful. The sewing is good (no loose threads or unsewn edges). The fabric seems a little on the thin side, so I hope it holds up. Overall, I'm very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A solid choice for a microfiber comforter set
reviews.reviewText: The grey Botanical Comforter Set is aesthetically pleasing. It's lightweight so good for all seasons but because it's on the thin side, it's not so great for winter. I really like the floral tree print which is what I think caught my eye with this product. I completely overlooked the fact that this is made of microfiber when I prefer cotton. With that being said, it is soft and feels smooth and cozy against my skin. It's not bad.Overall, I think this is a solid low-to-medium range choice for a comforter set. Even though it's thin, the softness and aesthetic it provides makes it worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Pretty Bed in a Bag
reviews.reviewText: I'm a big fan of the 'Bed in a Bag' concept. So I jumped on this and ordered this Botanical Comforter Set in Queen.This set consists of: One comforter, one fitted sheet, one flat sheet, two pillowcases, and two pillow shams. The shams and cases have an envelope-style end, which I personally prefer. The tag states that the material is 100% polyester.The comforter has a very pretty print, although it does feel a bit thin. It is shiny, and not particularly soft by my personal definition. Time will tell how much it softens up, or if the filling balls up in the individual little pockets of the comforter. I was able to wash the comforter in my standard sized washing machine and so far, it didn't fall apart, or lose the filling, like many similar products have.The sheets softened a bit, but they still have this strange satin-like sheen to them, that I don't usually associate with 'microfiber' bedding. Usually it's a softened appearance, and a bit less slippery feeling. They are also a bit thin, so I think I'll be more likely to rotate them in during the spring and summer months.My mattress is a deep, pillow top, and on top of that I have a 3" memory foam mattress pad. The fitted sheet is a big snug, (which I knew to expect) and the corners do tend to slip, (like nearly every single fitted sheet I have... don't get me started, lol) but that too. I would easily have added a star if these had corner elastic straps.Overall, this sheet set is very pretty, and satiny, and would be very comfortable in non-winter months. I will definitely use the set during the spring and summer.

reviews.reviewText: Comforter had paint on the inside of it and not very good quality..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight, well crafted, nice feel.
reviews.reviewText: Beyond being drawn to this set because of the print, I love the feel of the microfiber sheets and the deep pockets which fit well on my 10+ inch mattress and topper. Both the pillow case and shams have envelopes closed end which helps maintain a neat look. Would gladly buy a second set in another color as well.
